scripts.build-all: npm run build-docs && npm run build-site
scripts.watch-all: pulp -w --before 'npm run build-docs' build -I docs/src --to docs/dist/app.js
scripts.postinstall: bower i --silent && rm -rf bower_components/purescript-halogen-select && mkdir docs/dist && cp bower_components/purescript-cn-ui/dist/cn-tailwind.css docs/dist/cn-tailwind.css
scripts.build-site: cd docs/site && gutenberg build && cd ../ && cp -r site/public/. dist/
